attributes.action: Get rid of unnecessary questions from government forms. Our skin colour or sexuality should not affect the service the government supplies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On all government forms, we are asked about or skin colour and sexuality. The only way this information can be used is to discriminate. If I applied for a government service, I am British citizen and would expect that I am judged on my individual circumstances.
